dmca.title: IndoVacations complains of travelling text
dmca.body:
Dear Sir / Madam

We have discovered very recently that a considerable part of our website has been copied and used illegally without permission from us. We have prepared the appropriate information and mentioning this below. We request to you to please remove the below mentioned contents from your search results and take the appropriate action against this practice of the company whose information is as followed:

THE CAPER TRAVEL COMPANY PVT. LTD. (INDIA)
[private], Masjid Moth, South Extension, Part-II, New Delhi-110049 INDIA Tel. : [private], [private], Fax : [private] E-mail : [private]@capertravelindia.com, Website: http://www.capertravelindia.com
The prepared information has infringing pages and copyrighted work.

* Infringing pages are where our copyrighted information is being published illegally on www.capertravehndia.com.
* Copyrighted work is mentioned where the original contents are on our website Of needed further information can be provided)
1.	Infringing Web Page:	http://www.capertravelindia.com/india/colorful-rajasthan-tour.html
	Copyrightedwork:	www.indovacations.net\english\ColourfulRajasthan.htm
		
2.	Infringing Web Page:	http://www.capertravelindia.com/india/cultural-tour-of-rajasthan.html
	Copyrightedwork:	www.indovacations.net\english\CulturalTourofRaiasthan.htm
		
	Infringing Web Page:	http://www.capertravelindia.com/india/desert-tour-of-raiasthan.html

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. -
I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
Looking forward for an urgent and appropriate action in the above matter.

[private]

(Proprietor, Indo Vacations, [private], Valmiki Marg, Raja Park, Jaipur 302004, INDIA )
